name: Original File
summary: Often added to a file that already has an extension; may be appended to the filename, i.e. "page1.html" may become "page1.html.ori;" often used to differentiate between original and backup ( .BAK ) files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Open with the program that created the file

macos.display_name: Open with the program that created the file
